lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The multi-family area -- which typically represents rental units -- remained weak due to high vacancy rates and increased capital costs of such units following tax law changes effective January 1.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "At the same time that we are pumping up inventories in the first quarter, we could foresee production slowing in the second," cautioned Joe Plocek of McCarthy, Crisanti and Maffei Inc, who expects first quarter growth of about three pct.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. League of Savings Institutions in Washington, whose members supply much of the financing for home building.
